item.title: Lion

item.title: We Are
item.description: [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unsaid.md#here-it-goes-again-vyl-wnanory|We are, we are, we are made from broken parts]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unsaid.md#here-it-goes-again-vyl-wnanory|We are, we are, we are broken from the start]] [[songs/z/zanias/unearthed/unsaid.
